featured.text: If we go north or south, we won’t notice any difference, because there is usually no time zone change.
If one travels across three time zones, he needs about __________ hours to get over his jet lag problem.
Escaping from the war zone, by bombings.
Generally speaking, our biological clock is slightly disturbed if we just move into the next time zone, but jet lag becomes a problem once we have passed through three or four time zones.

definition.en_def: An area or region distinguished from others.
definition.example: The city is divided into several zones for different purposes.
